ValidationRule.description: Value Stream Link can not be blank for Board Type 'Gantt Cards Linked to Board'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( leankor__BoardType__c , 'Gantt Cards Linked to Board') ,ISBLANK( leankor__ValueStreamLink__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Value Stream Link must be set for Board Type 'Gantt Cards Linked to Board'.
